effect_size: Large vs placebo (RR = 3.82); comparable to antiemetics
notes: Cannabinoids for Chemotherapy-Induced Nausea and Vomiting: Cochrane Review
abstract: Cannabinoids superior to placebo: RR = 3.82 (95% CI: 1.55-9.42); Cannabinoids similar to conventional antiemetics: RR = 1.28 (95% CI: 0.89-1.84)
